column5: Hello. been watching the weather in the midwest and am just wondering how thick the ice might be on lake of the woods? what is the record year for thickness if they have such a thing. thanks just curious. alan
It's over 4 feet the last I heard.
I dug several holes last week in the Dryden area and would guess it was not more than 2 1/2 foot. Should be making good ice as the snow is not very deep and temps are low.
